document_data.name: Glei Yuindo
document_data.mainbody:
'''Glei Yuindo''' was an adventurer active in [[Koryo]] in the 1350s [[DR]].

In [[1357 DR]], a band of adventurers headed by Glei Yuindo returned to [[Pan (town)|Pan]] and it was rumored they had discovered the famous lost fortress of [[Toranu Ganppo]]. However, before they could tell their story, they died of a mysterious sickness.
